thread.title: Messi sets season worst - the stat that shows how bad it was for Barcelona star against PSG
thread.title_full: Messi sets season worst - the stat that shows how bad it was for Barcelona star against PSG

title: Messi sets season worst - the stat that shows how bad it was for Barcelona star against PSG
text:
0 15-Feb-2017 03:59:50 Much like the rest of his team-mates, the Argentine talisman had a match to forget against the French side. 
How bad was it for Barcelona against Paris Saint-Germain on Tuesday? There are many ways to measure the futility. 
There was the obvious - the 4-0 scoreline – a result which leaves the Catalan side needing a miracle in the Champions League round-of-16 second leg at Camp Nou in three weeks. 
Shocking Barcelona & Luis Enrique on the brink of disaster 
Then there's this stat for Lionel Messi, who somehow managed to go the entire match without a touch in PSG's box – a first for the season. 1 - Lionel Messi has failed to register a single touch in the opposite box in a #UCL game for the first time this season. Disconnection. pic.twitter.com/zwdduc0T3L 
Messi, whose giveaway led to PSG's second goal of the night, is unlikely to repeat that feat in the second leg, but can he and his Barca team-mates produce an almighty comeback? We will find out on March 8. Related
